mapper.select: SELECT voa.id as pid,voa.pm_id,voa.username,voa.nick_name,voa.icon,voa.tittle,voa.picture,voa.create_time,voa.start_number,voa.comment_number,pt.id,pt.tag_name FROM (SELECT * from view_of_album LIMIT #{pageNumber},6) AS voa,album_tag_relation AS atr,picture_tag AS pt WHERE voa.id=atr.album_id AND atr.tag_id=pt.id order by create_time desc

SELECT voa.id as pid,voa.pm_id,voa.username,voa.nick_name,voa.icon,voa.tittle,voa.picture,voa.create_time,voa.start_number,voa.comment_number,pt.id,pt.tag_name FROM (SELECT * from view_of_album LIMIT #{pageNumber},6) AS voa,album_tag_relation AS atr,picture_tag AS pt WHERE voa.id=atr.album_id AND atr.tag_id=pt.id AND voa.username = #{username} order by create_time desc

SELECT pa.id as pid,pm.username,pm.nick_name,pm.icon,pm.id AS pm_id,pa.tittle,pa.picture, pa.create_time,pa.start_number,pa.comment_number,pt.id,pt.tag_name FROM picture_album AS pa,picture_tag AS pt,pm AS pm,album_tag_relation AS atr WHERE pa.pm_id=pm.id AND pa.id=atr.album_id AND pt.id=atr.tag_id AND pa.id=#{pa_id}
